name: 008 Data Analysis on Parquet Files in ADLSGen2

content.query:
/*******************************************************************************************
Name: 008 Data Analysis on Parquet Files in ADLSGen2 
Connect To: SQL on-demand
Use database: master
Description: Use SQL on-demand to read data from data lake and analyze it
*********************************************************************************************/


SELECT
    StoreId 
    ,productCode
    ,SUM(cast(quantity as float)) as totalQuantity
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azuresynapsesa.dfs.core.windows.net/default/SurfaceRetailSalessurfaceretailsales.parquet/*',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
Group By StoreId, productCode
Order by totalQuantity desc
